name: philogyny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
love of or admiration of women: Philogyny came naturally to him. He confirms his philogyny by demonstrating the excellence of womankind by means of historical examples.
More examplesFewer examplesHis philogyny got him into a number of embarrassing situations.Nietzsche was not renowned for his philogyny.Increasing numbers of women are discovering their philogyny.
